name: TurnKee
description:
TurnKee is a pixel art turn-based roguelite dungeon crawler where you choose to move one tile every turn of 10 seconds.

You are Monkee. You're in some dungeon. There's keys in the rooms. They might unlock doors. There's enemies. Probably should avoid them...

Controls
Use the arrow or WASD keys to move one tile every 10 seconds. ALT F4 to quit without menu.

Code: Neonalig
Art: Studio Kraze

Font: Alagard by Hewett Tsoi

Note: This TurnKee prototype was made over a few days for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam with the theme of "every 10 seconds". This prototype is unfinished, missing features and systems.
